tool_description: Tracks pricing history and changes for products over time, identifying price trends, optimization opportunities, and competitive positioning.

product_ids.description: Products to track pricing history for

lookback_months.description: Number of months of price history to analyze (1-24)

error_messages: Invalid lookback period: lookback_months must be between 1 and 24.
Product IDs not found: One or more product IDs do not have price history data.
Insufficient price data: Not enough historical pricing data for meaningful trend analysis.
usage: Provide product_ids array and lookback_months to specify the historical period. Returns comprehensive pricing trends and change analysis.

price_trends.description: Price trend analysis for each product

average_prices.description: Average prices during the analysis period

price_volatility.description: Price volatility scores for each product
